name: MessageFactory_createConnectionBindErrorResponseTest
description: Unit tests for the createConnectionBindErrorResponse method in the MessageFactory class.

test_cases.name: testCreateConnectionBindErrorResponse_WithErrorCode
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a connection bind error response with a specific error code.

test_cases.name: testCreateConnectionBindErrorResponse_WithNullReasonPhrase
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a connection bind error response with a specific error code and no reason phrase.
